mobs.long_desc: A cartographer is busy mapping at his desk.
mobs.desc: The old cartographer is frantically transposing his thoughts from mind to material.  He cannot risk forgetting his paths from past adventures and must cartograph before his mind lets them loose and they are lost forever.

mobs.long_desc: Kathra the Beautiful is busy working on new maps.
mobs.desc: This dwarf is like no other you have ever seen!  Her hair is long, red, and glorious.  She wears tight armor leaving little to the imagination.

mobs.long_desc: The Knight Champion's worthless brother tends to the shop.
mobs.desc: A humble looking young man sits thoughtfully at his desk.  He isn't small for a human but in a town full of barbarians he is very underwhelming in comparison. He is determined to prove his worth after living in his brother's shadow.  You judge him as critically as his family has but save your judgment until after you examine his maps...  You will alter your perceptions!  He is eager to help.

mobs.long_desc: The outcast cartographer grumpily writes at his desk.
mobs.desc: This tall slender orc is obviously not in the mood to deal with the churlish. You'd better take care.  He is wearing armor that nearly resembles the orc patroller's in town.  Something terrible must have happened to push his shop so far from town...  Or did he build it after he was pushed out?

objects.short: a map of the South Caelia Wailing Mountains
objects.ground: A map of the towering Wailing Mountains of South Caelia waits here.

objects.short: a map of the South Caelia Borderhold and roads
objects.ground: A map of the Borderhold in South Caelia and its surrounding roads lays out.

objects.short: a map of Fangorn Forest
objects.ground: A map of the dense Fangorn Forest has been caught in a spider web.

objects.short: a map of Anlun Vale and Beach
objects.ground: A map of Anlun Vale and Beach lays here.

objects.short: a map of the Sacred Megalith
objects.ground: A partially complete map of the Sacred Megalith its forest maze has been drawn out.

objects.short: a map of Odaishyozen
objects.ground: A map of Odaishyozen, the Emerald Isle of the Arabel Ocean, is for sale here.

objects.short: a map of the Fortress of Mystwatch
objects.ground: A map of the trecherous Fortress of Mystwatch is here, carefully preserved.

objects.short: a map of Templace
objects.ground: A ruined map of the desecrated city Templace lays here.

objects.short: a map of Technitzitlan
objects.ground: A map of the icy city Technitzitlan rests here.

objects.short: a map of Urchet Pass
objects.ground: A mercantile route map lays here.

objects.short: a map of the Pine Barrens
objects.ground: A soggy map of the salty marsh sloshes about here.

objects.short: a map of Nukreth Spire
objects.ground: A blood-stained map of slaver routes is for sale here.

objects.short: a map of the Village of Nordus
objects.ground: A chaotically scribbled map sits here tossed aside.

objects.short: a map of Griffin Island
objects.ground: A map of a skull-shaped island floats by.

objects.short: a map of Fiery Island
objects.ground: A map covered in volcanic dust waits on a shelf.

objects.short: a map of the Arabel Ocean
objects.ground: An intercontinental navigation map tempts passing sailors.

triggers.name: Cartographer grumble
triggers.commands: if %self.vnum% == 600 mecho %self.name% mutters something about his memory fading... elseif %self.vnum% == 603 say What do you want?  I don't have all day. endif

triggers.name: outcast cartographer greet
triggers.commands: mecho %self.name% shouts, 'Quickly now, tell me what you want and get out!'

rooms.name: The Cartographer's Room
rooms.description: This cozy little room on the main floor of the inn belongs to a skilled cartographer.  It has been meticulously filled from top to bottom side to side, on every wall with books and scrolls.  The room is small and full but organized.
